nodes.text: Silk was a material that was found in the galaxy. Aric Nightdrifter had a fan made of silk. Silk could also be used to make clothing, and came in a number of types, such as Sleedaran silk, Cantonican golden silk, Onderon silk, Bardottan silk, Karlini silk, shimmersilk, Aeien silk, and durasilk. Count Dooku owned a pair of exquisite pajamas that were made from only the finest silks.
Silk was also produced by ginnthos, who used it to trap prey.
